testCases.label: sums numbers from 0 to n (input 3)
testCases.description: Verifies that Lab.whileExample uses a while loop to sum all integers from 0 up to, but not including, 3 and returns 3 (0+1+2).

testCases.label: sums numbers from 0 to n (input 5)
testCases.description: Verifies that Lab.whileExample correctly sums all integers from 0 up to, but not including, 5 and returns 10 (0+1+2+3+4).

testCases.label: sums numbers from 0 to n (input 6)
testCases.description: Verifies that Lab.whileExample correctly sums all integers from 0 up to, but not including, 6 and returns 15 (0+1+2+3+4+5).

testCases.label: returns 0 when input is 0
testCases.description: Verifies that Lab.whileExample handles the edge case where the input is 0 by returning 0 (no numbers to sum).
